name: yae
actor_no_arg: You sigh, burdened with Yet Another Eeediot.
others_no_arg: $n sighs, burdened with Yet Another Eeediot.
actor_found_target: There's Yet Another Eeediot in the room, and you're looking right at $M.
others_found: $n clearly believes that $N is an Eeediot!
target_found: $n glares at you, obviously not impressed with your intelligence.
actor_auto: There are plenty of Eeediots, but that one doesn't seem to be present.
others_auto: $n bonks $mself, HARD, and curses $mself for the Eeediot $e is!
